subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A World Cup qualifying match between host Croatia and Serbia has been feared as a potential flash point for nationalist fervor and memories of the ethnic clashes that brought war to the region in the 1990s.
snippet: A World Cup qualifying match between host Croatia and Serbia has been feared as a potential flash point for nationalist fervor and memories of the ethnic clashes that brought war to the region in the 1990s.
